grid: native atmosphere N96 gaussian grid (90x144 latxlon)
institution: Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation, Australia
references: Model system described by O'Kane et al. (2017)
run_variant: forcing: GHG, Oz, SA, Sl, Vl, BC, OC, (GHG = CO2, N2O, CH4, CFC11, CFC12, CFC113, HCFC22, HFC125, HFC134a)
